ingredients.item: 2.4kg Waitrose New Zealand Whole Lamb Leg
1 bulb garlic, unpeeled cloves roughly separated
1 red onion, peeled and cut into 8 wedges
1 tbsp Cooks' Ingredients Sundried Tomato Paste

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Place the lamb in a large roasting tin and roast for 30 minutes. Drain off as much of the fat from the tin as possible.

Add the potatoes, garlic, onion and leeks to the tin and scatter over the thyme. Roast for 10 minutes then stir together the chicken stock and tomato paste and pour into the tin. Cover tightly with foil, reduce the oven to 180°C, gas mark 4 and cook for a further 1 hour 5 minutes until the lamb and veg are tender.

Lift the lamb onto a carving board, cover with foil and a tea towel and leave to rest. Add the tomatoes to the tin, baste with the pan juices and roast for 10–15 minutes until the tomatoes are cooked through but still holding their shape.
Carve the lamb and serve with the roasted vegetables and pan juices.
